reviews.comments: Todo estuvo perfecto. Marisa es extraordinaria. El departamento de 10, muy cómodo y con fácil acceso a todo las zonas de interés. Muy recomendable!

Marisa fue muy amable al recibirme y mostrarme el departamento que es exactamente como se presenta en la publicación. Todo está en perfecto estado y el departamento es muy agradable y de excelente construcción. Sin duda recomiendo tanto al host como ala propiedad.

Marisa nos espero y nos mostró todo el departamento, muy servicial y con ánimo de ayudar. Despues respeto nuestra privacidad durante toda la estadía.
El departamento es tal cual las fotos, comodo para tres personas. Con una cocina completamente equipada.
La zona fue perfecta para lo que teníamos que hacer, con buenas conexiones de colectivos y subte.
Quedamos muy conformes con nuestra experiencia, recomiendo este apartamento 100%

Todo perfecto. El departamento estaba impecable, cuidando todos los detalles. Marisa es una persona muy agradable, siempre muy predispuesta... muy buena anfitriona. Nos sentimos muy a gusto los 3 días que estuvimos. Recomendable!

El departamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos,  impecable, limpio, con todo lo que uno necesita para estar alojado, realmente muy bonito y acogedor. La Sra. Marisa, su dueña, es una persona muy educada y servicial. La verdad un placer la experiencia.
Excelente departamento, Marisa muy rápida en contestar y atenta. Totalmente recomendable!

excelente departamento
excelente ubicacion
amabilidad de la anfitriona
espacios muy amplios
Es un departamento muy bien ubicado tal cual las fotos ,además Marissa es muy organizada te brinda el detalle de todos los servicios, transporte de la (URL HIDDEN) pasamos genial.
El departamento es muy cómodo y Marisa extremadamente amable. Un gran lugar para alojarse al visitar Buenos Aires.

Marisa es una excelente anfitrión, nos ayudó compartiendo toda la información que requerimos y nos explicó que servicios existen cerca de su apartamento, también nos dio consejos sobre que lugares visitar en Buenos Aires, su apartamento está ubicado en una muy buena zona.
Gracias Marisa

Nuestra experiencia ha sido excelente Marisa es muy buena anfitriona y el departamento esta muy bien equipado La limpieza es excelente. Tiene detalles que muestran la hospitalidad de la dueña que esta en todos los detalles

Marisa es una excelente anfitriona, todo organizado al mínimo detalle; no sólo que no tuvimos ningún inconveniente sino que además superó nuestras expectativas de hospedaje!
Muy agradecidos y seguros que en futuras visitas a nuestra querida Buenos Aires, de estar disponible, contrataremos el departamento de Marisa!
Excelente

TODO MUY BIEN. MARISA ES MUY BUENA ANFITRIONA , INCLUSO TE DEJA A DISPOSICION ARTICULOS DE TOCADOR ETC.
EL APARTAMENTO ESTA IMPECABLE Y ES MUY COMODO.
TAL VEZ PARA EL QUE VA CON LOCOMOCION ALGO COMPLICADO PARA ESTACIONAR.
PERO ESTA MUY CERCA DEL CENTRO PARA IR EN SUBTE ES MUY RAPIDO.
MUY CONTENTOS DE HABER ELEGIDO ESTE DEPARTAMENTO.

El dpto es muy bueno y luminoso tal y como sale en las fotos , con buena calefaccion , muy buen ubicado con todo lo necesario a pocos metros y cuadras y lo más importante con Marisa solucionando todos los pequeños inconvenientes y tratando de ayudarte al máximo , muchas gracias Marisa hiciste de mis estadía una excelente experiencia

Fue un gran placer quedarme en el departmento de Marisa. Ella es my agradable y el departamento es muy lindo y comodo.
Tiene buena vista ademas.  /// I really enjoyed my stay at Marisa's apartment.  The layout is spacious and comfortable. The view is great and the location very convenient. Marisa is a lovely host.

Increible experiencia! El departamento Es igual a las fotos! Todo impeccable limpio y completo por demas! Hasta Paraguas que nos vino re bien para Los dos dias de lluvia que pasamos, tabla y plancha. Muchisimo mejor que Un hotel! La ubicacion perfecta!
Marisa esta en todos Los detalles! Ya Lo recomendamos a familiares y amigos! Vamos a volver! 
Gracias por todo Marisa!

Marisa cuida mucho los detalles y el departamento estaba preparado como para llegar y empezar a vivir en el ( habia cafe, jabon, shampu y todas esas pequeñas cosas que parecen insignificantes pero que ayudan mucho). Marisa nos informó sobre los negocios, restaurantes, bares del barrio y nos dejó una carpeta completisima con mucha informacion practica. Muy lindo departamento, muy amplio. Lo volveremos a alquilar en nuestro proximo viaje a Buenos Aires
Muy buen lugar acogedor, nos sentimos muy bien.

Excelente anfitriona, con super buena disposición para aclarar dudas o lo que necesitemos.
El dpto. muy limpio, amplio, con todo lo necesario para una estadía cómoda y bien ubicado.
Si alguien es muy sensible con los ruidos para dormir, puede que no sea la mejor ubicación porque da directo a Av. Las Heras.

Nos quedamos 10 días en el departamento de Marisa y simplemente fue perfecto! El departamento está muy bien amueblado, amplio, grande, iluminado y limpio. Marisa pensó en cada detalle, no faltó absolutamente nada durante nuestra estancia. 
En cuanto a la comunicación uno debe decir que no podría ser más perfecto – cualquier cosa pudimos mandarle un mensaje a Marisa o llamarle y ella siempre contestó rapidísimo. 
Además es departamento está muy bien ubicado; hay varios colectivos justo al lado y el subte también está cerquita. Restaurantes, bares, supermercados y todo lo que uno necesita está cerca también. 
Vivir en el departamento de Marisa es súper recomendable, la próxima vez que estemos en Buenos Aires seguramente vamos a intentar alquilar este departamento de Marisa de vuelta. ¡Diez puntos! 

We spent ten days in Marisa’s apartment and I can only say that we had an amazing time! The apartment is spacious, very clean, nicely furnished and bright. Located on the 12th floor you have a fantastic view over Buenos Aires! 
Communication with Marisa was marvelous: whenever we needed anything or whenever there was any issue we could call Marisa or write her a message. She constantly replied to our messages within a very short time. I also found it great that she asked us how we were doing and that she gave us many interesting tips about places to visit in Buenos Aires. 
To my mind the apartment couldn’t have been located any better. Within a short walking distance you can find anything you need: supermarkets, bus stations (right in front of the entrance), subway stations, bars, restaurants etc… The trendy neighborhood of Palermo is also very very close. 
I highly recommend Marisa’s apartment in case you are planning to visit the wonderful city of Buenos Aires. Again, thank you very much Marisa!
La ubicación es muy practica , el barrio muy lindo y el Depto espectacular y muy cómodo tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Marisa nos recibió muy bien y nos hizo buenas recomendaciones .

El apartamento de Marisa es tal y como aparece en las fotografías, es muy luminoso, limpio y cómodo, nos sentimos como en nuestra casa!!!
Esta muy bien ubicado y comunicado
Respecto a Marisa, es muy amable y nos dio todo tipo de facilidades
Lo recomiendo y espero volver con mi familia
Gracias por todo Marisa

Me sentí bastante a gusto, la sra Marissa una anfitriona agradable y atenta, el apartamento en excelentes condiciones, tal cual fue descrito, ademas de una ubicación tranquila. con acceso al transporte y muy cerca supermercado, farmacia, panaderías internet, cajeros, etc.

El departamento es muy bonito, acogedor y limpio. Es tal cual se muestra en las fotografías.
Está bien ubicado con transporte de bus a todos lados.
La zona está muy bien.
Marisa es una persona amable siempre dispuesta ayudar y al pendiente de todo.

La experiencia fue increíble, el departamento muy lindo, tal como se ve en las fotos, muy cuidado. La zona agradable y bien ubicado. Muy cómodo. 
Marisa es una gran persona dispuesta a ayudar en cualquier cosa.

Sin lugar a dudas, volvería a quedarme acá.
El departamento es tal cual se presenta, super completo, limpio y perfectamente ubicado. Marisa es una host impecable y nuestra experiencia allí fue muy buena.
atención muy cordial, buenos datos para recorrer la cuidad, el barrio super central, seguro y bonito. el departamento amplio muy iluminado.
Excelente departamento,  super cómodo y la mejor ubicación.  Marisa, siempre dispuesta y servicial, lo recomiendo
It's close to the center, and you can reach any place easily by bus or metro.

Marissa goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome and your stay very comfortable. Providing  everything from grocery bags to coffee,maps and guide books. She responded quickly to any questions we had and met us at check in. The apartment is spacious and we enjoyed watching the city below from the balcony. The kitchen is very complete with anything you need for cooking. Be sure and get the pizza from the corner. Air conditioning in the bedrooms made the whole place comforable. Very safe and convenient for visiting sights in the city. We tried to extend our stay with her but had to move to a different location that was nearby- more expensive, smaller and not all the benefits that Marissa supplied. I will definetly stay here again.

We had a great 4 night stay at Marisa's Recoleta apartment on the 12th floor. It had all amenities, a/c, and was bright and relaxing. Marisa was such a helpful host with recommendations for visits, restaurants, and entertainment. Highly recommended.

Marisa is the best host we have ever stayed with in AirBnB. She was absolutely fantastic and gave us all the information we need. She even ensured that there where Subte (metro) cards for us to use. An absolutely brilliant host! The apartment had everything we needed, was centrally located and was very clean and well equipped. Definitely the place to say in BA!

Highly recommend. Large apartment in a very nice area of BA. Walking distance to many attractions, with buses and subway close by. Marisa is a great host, only too happy to advise and assist as requested. Thank you!
Fantastic apartment. Well located and had all the amenities. Would definitely go back again. Marisa was an excellent host.

We loved staying at Marisa’s apartment. It was perfect for exploring Buenos Aires. The apartment was extremely clean and spacious with everything we needed. The bakery is the best! We used the buses and trains but loved walking. The gardens in the area are beautiful and a great place to sit and enjoy. We would highly recommend Marisa’s apartment to anyone visiting Buenos Aires especially if it is your first visit.

The apartment surpassed expectations in every way. It was comfortable, clean and spacious. Marisa, as a seasoned host, anticipates guests needs and even provides a curated guidebook to guests on BA essentials and much more.  She was always a phone call or an email away but given her great instructions we were self-sufficient and comfortable with all aspects of the apartment, from the washer to the hot water tank.  We had a wonderful week in BA thanks to Marisa and our stay at her lovely apartment.  We highly recommend this apartment!
Amazing apartment with a great location in recoleta. The apartment has a beautiful balcony too. Marisa was a wonderful host and had many tips for where to eat and visit.

Marisa was the best host! She has extensive recommendations which are super useful and had a map ready for us with highlights of key locations. This place was exactly what we were looking for and more!

Mariza foi muito simpática e sempre respondeu todas as perguntas rapidamente por email. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo dos museus, parques, Recoleta, Palermo Soho, e ao mesmo tempo local com poucos turistas e por isso mesmo preços mais baixos que nos bairros mais turísticos. Recomendo e pretendo voltar. Obrigado por tudo Mariza!

Extremely happy with our stay at Marisa's apartment. Aside from being in the absolute most desirable neighborhood in Buenos Aires, The apartment was full of light and Marisa is a wonderful host. Any time we sent her a message, she immediately responded and was always very friendly and polite. I highly recommend this to anyone coming to BA.

Antes de comentar sobre o apartamento, gostaria de dizer da pessoa gentil, educada e prestativa que é a Marisa. Ficar no seu apartamento é um prazer e elegância. As fotos que Marisa postou são exatamente o que se encontra lá. O que chama a atenção além da beleza do apartamento é a limpeza e sua organização. Altamente recomendado não só pelo apartamento, mas também pela pessoa maravilhosa que é a Marisa.
reviews.response: Obrigado Valdir! Vocês são pessoas realmente maravilhosas. Será um prazer poder hospedá-lo novamente!

reviews.comments: Marisa is very helpful and responsive, the appartment is very well equipped and corresponds exactly to the pictures. However, the appartment is on a very busy street and is noisy because of the buses despite it is on the 12th floor. In addition, the neighbour on the 13th floor has a dog constantly running  on the wooden floor (its nails have not been cut for ages...) which at the end disturbs sleep several times every night.
reviews.response: I apologize for any inconveniences you may have experienced  during  your stay. Guest feedback is very important to me and I have already undergone renovations in the windows to improve soundproofing in all the rooms. Moreover, both balanced draft stoves facing the street have just been removed in both bedrooms and a new silent cold/hot  air conditioner is in place in the second one. The  upstairs neighbour has already cut the nails of her eleven year old dog-I had never noticed him, honestly. Both bedrooms are now quiet also for those not used to living in a big city.  Hope to have another opportunity to host you if your travels bring you back to Buenos Aires.

reviews.comments: Marisa is a wonderful host And will do everything to make you comfortable.

HOST -  Marisa was exceptionally helpful and responsive to all our questions and needs.  She really made sure we would know how to get around, and where to go - she even provided a couple "pass" cards so we could get on the public transportation system.
PLACE - Was very nice and comfortable.  It included all the amenities described in the ad.  I did notice a bit of mold under the bathroom sink's, which Marisa said she would take care of.  Other than that, Marisa's place was cozy and inviting.
CONVENIENCE - Easy access to stores, shops, buses, metro.  Safe, and in one of the best sections of town.
reviews.response: The mold was due to a bit of grout missing  between joints of the marble counter top. Thank you for your review and your accurate observation!

reviews.comments:
Fomos atendidos pela Marisa com gentileza, cortesia e no horário marcado. O apartamento é o que se pode ver nas imagens: limpo, aconchegante e dispõe de infra-estrutura completa. Para quem curte TV quando viaja, muitos canais estão disponíveis, a internet é veloz, as camas são bem confortáveis e o silêncio é garantido pelas janelas de vidros duplos. Cozinha com tudo para fazer seu próprio café da manhã e pequenas refeições. Tem até máquina de lavar roupas! A localização é perfeita, numa região segura onde se pode caminhar inclusive à noite sem medo. O transporte é fácil e à porta para todas as regiões (com o (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps você vê as linhas de ônibus, metrô e suas correspondências para toda a cidade). 
Recomendo o apartamento da Marisa com tranquilidade de quem viaja e usa o aplicativo Airbnb.

Marisa's place is really well located, a few minutes' walk from a metro stop, and close to lots of amenities and attractions. Recoleta is an interesting, safe area and we felt very much at home. The apartment is very well-equipped, modern and comfortable and it's easy to work out how to use everything. Marisa met us on arrival and was really helpful and kind. Would strongly recommend staying here.

A brilliant start to our South American sojourn . Marisa is so hospitable & helpful & her apt is very clean & has absolutely everything you need . All the little extras are so appreciated . There are many nice restaurants close by - delicious cheap empanadas across road at Gourmet Empanadas , Los Pinos is not too far away & a cheap taxi ride to Palermo is the best coffee in BA - Full city Coffee House ! 
The Recoleta cemetery is easily within walking distance as are supermarkets & shopping centre . 
A very good money exchange is close by too - Marisa - has a very helpful booklet with all these tips in . Highly recommended- Thank you so much Marisa

Ho visitato per la prima volta Buenos Aires insieme a mio papa' e prenotato con mesi d'anticipo questo meraviglioso appartamento. Marisa e' fantastica, dal primo momento e' sempre stata disponibile e molto gentile e ci ha aiutato a rendere il soggiorno indimenticabile! Dopo un breve viaggio in Uruguay siamo tornati a Buenos Aires e prenotato un altro appartamento di Marisa sempre alla Recoleta, siamo stati molto soddisfatti e ci torneremmo di sicuro, grazie di cuore Marisa!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Marisa is a super host and her apartment is terrific. If you are looking to stay in a luxury apartment in the Recoleta, this is definitely the place to stay! Thank you for everything Marisa!

Fantastic apartment. Fantastic host.  The apartment was spacious, spotlessly clean, very comfortable, well appointed, kitchen very equipped, and location ideal. Marisa could not have been more helpful. Communicated promptly to all my messages, provided plenty of information and tips on things to do, places to see and eat, where to shop etc etc. I highly recommend Marisa 's apartment for short or long term stay in BA!!

Reservei o apartamento da Marisa para 3 pessoas: eu, minha esposa e minha sogra. Dias antes da viagem, meu filho de 21 anos ia ter uma semana de folga na faculdade e resolveu ir com a gente. Fiquei muito preocupado, pois o apartamento havia sido reservado para 3 pessoas e achei que talvez não seria possível ela nos atender com uma acomodação a mais. Para minha surpresa, Marisa aceitou de pronto e não colocou nenhum obstáculo, tornando nossa estadia melhor ainda. A localização é ótima, o apartamento é muito bem cuidado e a Marisa coloca uns "mimos" (amenidades) que expressam muito bem o carinho e atenção que ela dispensa aos hóspedes: Tem cartão para o transporte público, shampoo, café, guarda-chuva, etc.  Ficamos todos muito satisfeitos e positivamente surpreendidos. Indo a Buenos Aires, vale muito a pena se hospedar no apartamento de Marisa. Por isso os comentários e elogios são sempre excelentes. Marisa, obrigado por ter ajudado a termos uma semana maravilhosa em Buenos Aires.
reviews.response:
Obrigado a voces Edson!
Talvez no futuro eu adicionar conforto para 4 pessoas.
Abracos

reviews.comments: The apartment is in a great central location. It's on a major street and feels noisy at first, but we quickly got used to it and appreciated being able to pick up a bus or taxi just outside the door. The place was clean, conveniently laid out, and spacious enough to do tango practice in! All good.

We stayed at Marisa's place for four nights and we were very pleased. Marisa greeted us when we arrived, showed us around the place and provided suggestions (along with detailed maps) of places to see. She had several ways to reach her if we had any issues during our stay - which we did not. 

Marisa's place is clean and comfortable. Has a nice balcony overlooking the avenue and an elevator in the building. 

The place is centrally located to many of the sites either by taxi, bus or subte. 

Would recommend Marisa's place when in Buenos Aires.
Great place! Great apartment!
Comfortable and spacious for 3 people, well-equipped with everything we needed. Marisa provided clear instructions and great restaurant recommendations.

Very comfortable apartment in a great area.  Walkable or eazy access to public transport.
Better then the pictures and Marisa is lovely and helpful?
You won't go wrong if you stay here!
Have fun.

A Marisa nos recebeu pessoalmente no apartamento quando lá chegamos. Ela é muito atenciosa e nos explicou detalhadamente sobre como tudo funcionava no apartamento. Nos passou dicas dos melhores restaurantes e cafés da região e também de como se locomover em Buenos Aires. O apartamento é excelente e nos sentimos em casa. Várias toalhas, sabonete, shampoo.
Na cozinha não precisamos nos preocupar com vários itens que normalmente teríamos que comprar tais como café, açúcar, guardanapo, lava louça, coador e varios outras coisas.
O apartamento além de ser muito confortável fica muito próximo a linhas de ônibus e metro. Muitos dos pontos turísticos ficam próximos deste excelente apartamento.
Agradecemos à Marisa pela excelente recepção

This is a clean well located apartment in BA - close to buses and walkable to many interesting places.  Well equipped apartment, clean, nice kitchen, wi-fi +++ - spacious - this is the second time we used this apartment and if we would go to BA again we would try to book it.  And you have Marisa if you have any problems and she is as helpful as she can be.

Fantastic property. Lots of space, a well equipped kitchen with coffee machine and basics such as coffee, tea and oil. Bath and a great shower. Wifi worked well. Air conditioning was much appreciated on the hot January days. Beautiful wooden floors. On a busy street but no noise due to thé 12th floor location and soundproof windows. Great bus service from outside the door. 
Marisa met us and showed us how things worked. She gave advice about transport, restaurants and shopping and left a folder with this information and more. Also left Sube cards which we appreciated. 
She is the perfect host and we would recommend this apartment to everyone.
Marisa was fantastic. She went above and beyond to make this experience excellent. I would recommend her places to everyone!

This is a lovely clean apartment in a good location. The nearby cafe was fantastic and the apartment had everything we needed especially the little extras like soap, tea and coffee etc. Our host was great and waited for us when we were late from the airport and provided many useful tips on getting around the city. We would totally recommend this apartment.

Marisa was an excellent host.  We have stayed at many airbnb apartments, and she was extraordinarily helpful and friendly!  She provided many good suggestions and a beautiful, centrally located, unit.  Marisa, you were simply great; we highly recommend you and your apartment.
This apartment is amazing! More than we expected! Beautiful, clean, centrally located! Marisa was an excellent host!
Beautiful, well equipped apartment, centrally located with an extremely helpful host made our one week stay very comfortable. Five ***** rental. Highly Recommended!!!

Marisa was very timely in her correspondence with us and in giving us additional information about the apt, the restaurants near by and which public transit would get you around. Also a very nice touch was the bus cards that we could easily load. Apartment was as portrayed. Nice large two bedroom apartment with enough kitchen pots and pans to prepare some of our own meals. Grocery shops and green grocers close by within ten minute walk as well as a great bakery.coffee spot at the end of the block. The only reservation we had was street noise with many buses and ambulances which did calm down over night. Ear plugs were needed which is never a surprise when travelling to any large city.

Lovely clean comfortable well appointed apartment. Brilliant location. Marisa has thought of everything. Had coffee, tea, oil.soap, shampoo washing detergent etc etc. Did not need anything the first day until we did a shop. Super hostess. Highly  recommend Marisa's place for short and long term stays. Thanks Marisa for everything. Your apartment made our holiday in Buenos Aires so much more enjoyable.
So nice we stayed twice! Marisa is a wonderful host - I can't recommend her apartment enough.

A Marisa e uma excelente anfitria! Muito pontual! Referente ao apartamento, nao podia ter encontrado lugar melhor! Muito bem localizado, muito muito limpo e organizado! Se encontra tudo e de forma ordenada! a internet funciona muito bem e o lugar esta na recoleta perto de tudo! Voltarei sem duvidas!
Marisa was a wonderful host. Very attentive, easily reachable. The apartment was beautiful and the neighborhood is charming. I would definitely stay again. So I did!

I stayed at Marisa's place for 3 nights together with two of my friends. We couldn't have asked for more. Our plane was supposed to arrive around midday and was cancelled. The next one was in the evening, and meant due to a delay that we arrived quite late that night. Marisa was waiting for us at the apartment and was still so kind to explain everything in the flat and also what to do in the city and what to watch out for. It was so nice! 
The flat itself was beautiful, very clean and had everything we needed. It looks like on the pictures. 
I can highly recommend this place. We loved it and would always go back. Thanks again to Marisa!

Wonderful apartment. Marisa answered all our initial emails very promptly. She met us at the apartment even when we arrived earlier than expected. She then spent some time orienting us to the apartment and Buenos Aires. We received some very helpful maps and guides as well as a pass for the subway. We were given recommendations about restaurants, bars and tango shows.

The apartment itself was great. It was a good size, certainly bigger than others we looked at in Buenos Aires. The rooms were clean and spacious. All in all we had a great stay!

Marisa was very nice, explained everything about the apartment. The neighborhood is fantastic, with transportation to everywhere. There are cool cafes half block away and a gym ( very important to me)

Marisa is indeed a perfect host- very helpful and friendly. The apartment is extremely comfortable and convenient with all amenities nearby. What surprised us most is marisa's attention to detail when preparing the apartment for our stay. Marisa had thought of every little necessity and provided for it. Thanks for making our stay so pleasant Marisa!

Marisa responded extremely quickly to my emails & provided a high level of service via email & again when I met her in person in Buenos Aires. Marisa was everything in the reviews I read & more. She was very helpful & explained everything about the apartment & offered very helpful insights into things to do, restaurant suggestions, directions, etc in perfect English. This was good for us as, unfortunately, we do not speak Spanish. The apartment was exactly as I expected. Thank you Marisa.

Marisa's apartment in Recoleta was warm and inviting. Set on a main street, walking distance to Recoleta Cemetario, Parks and Museums it was a great base for our time in Buenos Aires. The Metro is within walking distance, buses frequent the avenue. The building is safe and secure with lift access to the 12th floor with great views over Buenos Aires. Marisa was responsive and helpful and was there for check in and key handover.

Our stay at Marisa's was perfect. The apartment is very well appointed, and the description provided was accurate. The location is ideal for a shorter stay.
Marisa herself was approachable and easy to communicate with, and could not have been more helpful. We stayed for four nights as a married couple and a close female friend, and all rate the experience highly.
Thank you Marisa.
Michael New Zealand

The time we spent in Marisa's flat was nice and pleasant! The hostess received us and showed us all the accommodations, features and functionalities of the place itself, but also pointed us the spots nearby, such as restaurants, touristic sites and currency exchange directions. She provided us maps of Buenos Aires. The apartment is pretty, well maintained, sunny, cozy, functional and very well situated. We fell happy, restful and wishing to come back.

A estadia no apartamento de Marisa foi muito agradável! A nossa anfitriã nos recepcionou mostrando as acomodações e funcionalidade dos equipamentos internos, mas também mapeou os locais mais próximos, como restaurantes, casas de câmbio e locais turísticos. Disponibilizou mapas de Buenos Aires. O apartamento é belo, bem conservado, ensolarado, confortável, funcional e muito bem localizado. Sentimo-nos felizes e tranquilos e com vontade de voltar.

A estadia foi fantástica! Marisa foi bastante acolhedora, nos ajudou em tudo. O apartamento é ótimo e muito bem localizado. Além disso, é muito bem equipado, pode-se cozinhar tranquilamente. A vizinhança é (URL HIDDEN) certeza ficaremos hospedados lá novamente, quando voltarmos a Buenos Aires.
Great experience! Marisa was responsive and friendly, and the apartment was very comfortable - thank you for a lovely stay :)

The apartment is in a very good neighbourhood with plenty of cafes , restaurants , bus stops and subways.
The apartment is exactly as described , clean , warm and spacious.
Marisa was there to welcome us
Throughout our stay she was extremely helpful with tourist and transport information and in particular retreived our lost luggage, very patiently answered our endless queries and arranged a taxi for us to the airport. I would highly recommend her. Thank you again to Marisa for all her help.
,

Fan-tas-tic.
Like staying at your sweet auntie's classy apartment.
Incredibly flexible ( we had our flight cancelled as we were flying to BA from Iguazu, Marisa was very, very flexible and due to the availability we were able to reschedule.)
The apartment's location is very good, between Recoleta and Palermo Soho, it felt like home. Safe and clean, with a really comfy bed, nice view, and a concierge.
Ultra delicious empanadas close by the same as many other businesses.
We didn't want to leave....
5* to Marisa's place.

Staying in Marisa's apartment really made our stay in Buenos Aires the best it could be. 

It is such a beautiful, clean and homely place in a wonderful position and everything has been thought of. Marisa was such a wonderful and accommodating host, so quick with replies with queries and had so much helpful information for us when we checked in. We couldn't have asked for anything more.

A Marisa é uma anfitriã excepcional. Desde o começo sempre foi muito prestativa para dar informações e dicas sobre a cidade. Ela conhece Buenos Aires muito bem e dará sugestões excelentes de lugares para visitar. O apartamento é impecável e muito bem localizado, com acesso fácil para as principais atrações da cidade, além de estar em um bairro muito seguro e muito bonito. Além disso, a Marisa pensa em todos os detalhes que podem tornar sua estadia mais fácil. Coisas pequenas (como adaptadores de tomada, acesso à internet, etc) que podem parecer irrelevantes (mas que podem gerar algum transtorno se você precisar delas) estão todas disponíveis e garantem uma praticidade enorme para quem se hospeda no apartamento. Tudo muito limpo e bem cuidado. Além disso, Buenos Aires é uma excelente cidade. Certamente, em minhas futuras visitas à cidade, ficarei hospedado no mesmo local.

Marissa is one of the best hosts I've ever had on Airbnb. She is super organised, communicative and efficient. The flat is big, chic and in a great location for exploring all of Buenos Aires (rather than for those that just want to hang around Palermo) as its more centrally located in Recoletta. 

Clean, tidy, good bathroom and second bedroom. Despite being on a main road very little noise- and the advantage of this is having loads of buses going into the centre, the station and Palermo. 

Marissa also gave us great tips for restaurants and cafes- little coffee places, empanadas, Italian restaurants and parillas. Really helpful. Couldn't recommend her highly enough

The apartment was just as described, clean and withing walking distance to the groceries store, restaurants,cafes,points of interest,etc... Marisa was at the apartment waiting to give us a walk through and all information needed. The windows work great not disturbed at all by noises. All and all you can't go wrong renting this place!

The apartment was great, and Marisa is a fantastic host, who had lots of notes and maps available, and even a couple of sube cards for public transport for us to use. 

The apartment was as described, comfortable and well located - we were able to walk or catch the subte everywhere we wanted to go.

Our host Marisa was super acomodating, attentive and welcoming. When i arrived (ahead of the others) she made sure she explained everything to me and also left comprehensive notes. We spent 8nights here. 
The apartment was clean, had quite a well equiped kitchen - plenty for any traveler and with more than you will need in it. We were provided with tea, coffee, condiments which were super usufull and much appreciated.
The location is superb - several buses stop infront of the building, the subway is a few blocks away and shops - bakeries, fruit and veggie shops and whatever other ones you may need, are not further than a stroll.
Marisa left us some transport cards that were super usefull too.
Being a super busy city, that never sleeps, Buenos Aires is noisy. If you, like me, are used to absolute silence when you sleep, get some ear-plugs. I was the only one  from our groups of three that used them but i found them necesery.
We had a superb stay and i highly recomend this apartment!

Maria's made us very welcome with a thorough explanation of the flat, the subway and how to get to art galleries. The flat was just as in the pictures and despite failing to follow her best instructions on how to leave the flat at the end of the trip she was there to rescue us from being stuck inside the entrance! Advice to future Airbnb-ers - FOLLOW HER INSTRUCTIONS ASSIDIOUSLY. We had a lovely stay in Recoleta. thank you Marisa
reviews.response: When I arrived at 10:00am, many neighbours were going in and out of the building as usually,  you had already left the keys inside of the apartment as stated and I noticed most of your luggage, except for two bags, was already inside the taxi I had called in advance for you . The porter was holding the entrance door wide open so that it was more comfortable for you to carry your luggage, and you greeted me with a huge smile. Sorry Karen, I can’t understand the expression “being stuck”.

reviews.comments: We had an awesome time staying at Marisa's lovely apartment. She is very welcoming and gave us some really great advice on what to visit and how to get around the city. The apartment is in a nice part of town so we always felt safe. We would definitely recommend Marisa as a host and her apartment.

Marisa met us on time at this lovely, bright and  spacious apartment.  It was very comfortable, generously equipped, quiet and well located.   Since we have been to Buenos Aires many times we did not need tips and tourist materials, but the information provided is excellent.  Internet speed was excellent.

Marisa was gracious and helpful.

Tout est parfait chez Marisa: l'accueil, l'hôtesse, la documentation, les suggestions, l'appartement, le quartier... et les cartes prépayées pour les transports en commun. Tout est pensé pour que nous ayons la meilleure expérience qui soit. Merci Marisa, vous avez rendu notre visite à Buenos Aires superbement agréable!!!

Marisa's apartment is comfortable, centrally located and well- equipped. The apartment is as pictured and described. Marisa is welcoming and provided a wonderful city guide to the area, local maps, and city transit cards, as well as setting up our transfer back to the airport. We also very much appreciated the mid- stay cleaning of the apartment during our 2 week stay in Buenos Aires.

Vi er svært fornøyd med beliggenheten. Vi er ganske godt kjent i byen og området og det er her vi foretrekker å bo når vi er i Buenos Aires.
Leiligheten var virkelig helt etter vår smak, moderne og stilren. Det var meget god standard og det var rent. Vi fikk også tilbud om vaskehjelp som vi takket nei til da det ikke var nødvendig.
Vi var tre personer og hadde god plass. 
Marissa var vennlig og hjelpsom uten å være påtrengende, den perfekte vert.
Ved neste besøk i BA vil forsøke å leid denne leiligheten på nytt.
Vi anbefaler denne leiligheten på varmeste.

Marisa is an excellent host. She gave clear instructions to the apartment and was waiting to give us all the information that we needed. Everything about the apartment was great, it was quiet and clean.
Marisa supplies plenty of info and maps and even 2 loaded cards for the public transport. 
The area has everything in walking distance and is a lovely retreat after a day of sightseeing. I can highly recommend Marisa and the apartment!

Wonderful host, extremely helpful and friendly. Everything as described
Place was perfect.

Fantastic!! 
This is a perfect place to stay. There is nothing to complain about. Marisa has everything organised to make you feel at home. She has payed a lot of attention to detail providing everything you would have at home..!! 
The apartment is in a great location and is very clean. The apartment is quiet and the air conditioner works very well. The wifi is good. Shower is excellent. Both beds are very comfortable too. Marisa is only a phone call away and very helpful. The apartment has a phone to make local calls.. 
EXPRESS supermarket across the road. 
Great place to stay in Buenos Aires.
Best air bnb we have stayed in!!

L'appartement de Marisa est chaleureux et lumineux. Il est bien situé, dans un quartier proche des parcs. Marisa a facilité notre séjour en mettant à notre disposition des cartes de transport, des plans, et en réservant notre taxi pour assurer un départ dans la nuit.
Merci Marisa !

This apartment is spacious, charming, and ideal for multiple travelers looking for a great location to stay at in Buenos Aires.  

Marisa is the best host I've ever seen.  Her recommendations made for a great experience, and her tour of the apartment upon arrival was informative and essential.  The loaded transit passes Marisa left for my friend and I was the perfect touch.
